english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. There is a light. It burns brighter than the sun. He steals the night. And casts no shadow. There is hope. Should oceans rise and mountains fall. He never fails
english.segment2: [Chorus:]. So take heart. Let His love lead us through the night. Hold on to hope. And take courage again
english.segment3: [Verse 1:]. In death by love. The fallen world was overcome. He wears the scars of our freedom. In His Name. All our fears are swept away. He never fails
english.segment4: [Bridge:]. All our troubles. And all our tears. God our hope. He has overcome
english.segment5: All our failure. And all our fear. God our love. He has overcome. All our heartache. And all our pain. God our healer. He has overcome
english.segment6: All our burdens. And all our shame. God our freedom. He has overcome
english.segment7: All our troubles. And all our tears. God our hope. He has overcome
english.segment8: All our failures. And all our fear. God our love. He has overcome
english.segment9: God our justice. God our grace. God our freedom. He has overcome
english.segment10: God our refuge. God our strength. God is with us. He has overcome
